responses.body:
{
    "result": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "title": "Ham & Crab Sticks",
                "image": "pizza_one",
                "description": "Variety is the keyword for the creation! Fresh prawns, succulent crab sticks, ham and juicy pineapple.",
                "unit" : "1 gram, 2 pieces",
                "price": 50
            },
            {
                "id": 2,
                "title": "Double Cheese",
                "image": "pizza_two",
                "description": "Topped with lots of fresh prawns, crab sticks, mussels and calamari with Marinara sauce.",
                "unit" : "1 gram, 6 pieces",
                "price": 35
            },
            {
                "id": 3,
                "title": "Chicken Trio",
                "image": "pizza_three",
                "description": "We pick the tastiest ingredients and create this sensational menu! Every form pork sausages.",
                "unit" : "0.5 gram, 3 pieces",
                "price": 45
            }
            ,
            {
                "id": 4,
                "title": "Ham & Mushroom",
                "image": "pizza_four",
                "description": "Yummy combination of sweet and sour flavor of juicy pineapples with loads of ham and bacon.",
                "unit" : "0.5 gram, 2 pieces",
                "price": 75
            }
            ,
            {
                "id": 5,
                "title": "Double Pepperoni",
                "image": "pizza_five",
                "description": "Pizza (Italian: [ˈpittsa], Neapolitan: [ˈpittsə]) is a savory dish of Italian origin consisting of a usually round, flattened base",
                "unit" : "1 gram, 1 pieces",
                "price": 100
            }
        ],
    "statusCode": 200,
    "message": "Success"
}

{
    "result": [
            {
                "id": 6,
                "title": "Sashimi",
                "image": "sushi_one",
                "description": "VarietyTechnically not sushi! While sushi is fish that is served with rice and may be adorned with other ingredients.",
                "unit" : "0.1 gram, 10 pieces",
                "price": 50
            },
            {
                "id": 7,
                "title": "Nigiri",
                "image": "sushi_two",
                "description": "Nigiri is a style of sushi that is made by molding a ball of vinegared rice by hand and topping it with a slice of raw fish.",
                "unit" : "0.2 gram, 8 pieces",
                "price": 35
            },
            {
                "id": 8,
                "title": "Chirashi",
                "image": "sushi_three",
                "description": "Chirashi, meaning, “scattered,” is a bowl of vinegared rice topped with a mix of raw fish (typically chef’s choice) and various garnishes.",
                "unit" : "0.5 gram, 3 pieces",
                "price": 45
            }
            ,
            {
                "id": 9,
                "title": "California Roll",
                "image": "sushi_four",
                "description": "California Rolls look like an inside-out sushi roll with a layer of rice on the outside and a sheet of nori on the inside.",
                "unit" : "0.5 gram, 2 pieces",
                "price": 75
            }
            ,
            {
                "id": 10,
                "title": "Tempura Roll",
                "image": "sushi_five",
                "description": "Tempura Rolls, like California Rolls, have the rice on the outside around a sheet of nori containing tempura-fried shrimp along with vegetables like avocado and cucumber. ",
                "unit" : "1 gram, 1 pieces",
                "price": 100
            }
        ],
    "statusCode": 200,
    "message": "Success"
}

{
    "result": [
            {
                "id": 11,
                "title": "Tea",
                "image": "drink_one",
                "description": "VarietyTechnicallyTea has been around almost as long as civilization—it was discovered nearly 5,000 years ago in ancient China.",
                "unit" : "30 ml, 1 cup",
                "price": 50
            },
            {
                "id": 12,
                "title": "Coffee",
                "image": "drink_two",
                "description": "Coffee is considered by many to be the most popular hot beverage in the world.",
                "unit" : "0.5 l, 1 bottle",
                "price": 35
            },
            {
                "id": 13,
                "title": "Beer",
                "image": "drink_three",
                "description": "If you’d ask a beer lover, they’d tell you that beer is the best drink in the world.",
                "unit" : "0.75 l, 2 bottles",
                "price": 45
            }
            ,
            {
                "id": 14,
                "title": "Soup",
                "image": "drink_four",
                "description": "CaliforniaAlthough soup isn’t technically a beverage, it deserves a spot on this list.",
                "unit" : " 500 ml, 2 cups",
                "price": 75
            }
            ,
            {
                "id": 15,
                "title": "Coca-Cola",
                "image": "drink_five",
                "description": "Although Coca-Cola doesn’t fall into the traditional category of types of drinks because it’s actually a specific brand. ",
                "unit" : "300 ml, 1 cup",

    "message": "Success"
}
